div.p: A switch indicating whether or not a Managed Care Organization (MCO) has paid the provider for an institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmmcopd_sw
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

description.value: A switch indicating whether or not a Managed Care Organization (MCO) has paid the provider for an institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_mco_pd_sw
